free.name: Starter
free.description: For churches with a single steward.
features: Add & display your own song lyrics
Full text search of the entire Bible offline
Multiple Bible translations (incl. Spanish, Igbo, Yoruba, Hausa)
Various slide modifications: blur, brightness, font styles, and more
Quick actions to access every feature in one place

teams.name: Teams
teams.description: For churches that need collaboration tools for multiple stewards.
features: Access to growing library (9,000+ songs) added by other churches
Add local and external videos (YouTube/Vimeo) with playback
Save multiple service schedules and access previous schedules
Unlimited Full HD slide backgrounds based on searched themes
Workspace invitations for other team members
Free storage (up to 5GB, will grow over time)
